about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: It is against the law to enter an intersection when:

about.name: It is against the law to enter an intersection when:

hasPart.assesses: It is against the law to enter an intersection when: | It is against the law to enter an intersection when: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Do not enter an intersection if you cannot get completely across before the traffic signal light turns red. If you block the intersection, you can be cited.

suggestedAnswer.text: You can't get all the way across before the light turns red.

comment.text: You can't get all the way across before the light turns red.

suggestedAnswer.text: The light is flashing yellow and you didn't stop first.

comment.text: The light is flashing yellow and you didn't stop first.

suggestedAnswer.text: The light is yellow and you cannot stop safely.

comment.text: The light is yellow and you cannot stop safely.

acceptedAnswer.text: You can't get all the way across before the light turns red.

comment.text: You can't get all the way across before the light turns red.

answerExplanation.text: Do not enter an intersection if you cannot get completely across before the traffic signal light turns red. If you block the intersection, you can be cited.

comment.text: It is against the law to enter an intersection when: | Do not enter an intersection if you cannot get completely across before the traffic signal light turns red. If you block the intersection, you can be cited.

hasPart.name: Which of the following road surfaces freezes first?

about.name: Which of the following road surfaces freezes first?

hasPart.assesses: Which of the following road surfaces freezes first? | Which of the following road surfaces freezes first? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Pavement on bridges and overpasses can become icy even when other surrounding pavement is dry. Bridges often freeze before, and thaw out after, the rest of a road.

answerExplanation.text: Pavement on bridges and overpasses can become icy even when other surrounding pavement is dry. Bridges often freeze before, and thaw out after, the rest of a road.

comment.text: Which of the following road surfaces freezes first? | Pavement on bridges and overpasses can become icy even when other surrounding pavement is dry. Bridges often freeze before, and thaw out after, the rest of a road.

hasPart.name: When passing a row of parked vehicles, you should:

about.name: When passing a row of parked vehicles, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When passing a row of parked vehicles, you should: | When passing a row of parked vehicles, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Keep a space between your vehicle and parked vehicles. A person may step out of a parked vehicle or out from between the parked vehicles without looking. A driver may begin moving their vehicle before realizing you are there.

suggestedAnswer.text: Be prepared for a person or vehicle to unexpectedly enter your lane.

comment.text: Be prepared for a person or vehicle to unexpectedly enter your lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Expect all other drivers and pedestrians to respect your right-of-way.

comment.text: Expect all other drivers and pedestrians to respect your right-of-way.

suggestedAnswer.text: Drive closely to the parked vehicles to allow more room for moving traffic.

comment.text: Drive closely to the parked vehicles to allow more room for moving traffic.

acceptedAnswer.text: Be prepared for a person or vehicle to unexpectedly enter your lane.

comment.text: Be prepared for a person or vehicle to unexpectedly enter your lane.

answerExplanation.text: Keep a space between your vehicle and parked vehicles. A person may step out of a parked vehicle or out from between the parked vehicles without looking. A driver may begin moving their vehicle before realizing you are there.

comment.text: When passing a row of parked vehicles, you should: | Keep a space between your vehicle and parked vehicles. A person may step out of a parked vehicle or out from between the parked vehicles without looking. A driver may begin moving their vehicle before realizing you are there.

hasPart.name: If you pass a school bus that is stopped with its red lights flashing, you will:

about.name: If you pass a school bus that is stopped with its red lights flashing, you will:

hasPart.assesses: If you pass a school bus that is stopped with its red lights flashing, you will: | If you pass a school bus that is stopped with its red lights flashing, you will: - Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Drivers must come to a complete stop when approaching a school bus stopped with its red lights flashing. Failure to stop until the red lights stop flashing may result in license suspension and a fine of up to $1,000.

answerExplanation.text: Drivers must come to a complete stop when approaching a school bus stopped with its red lights flashing. Failure to stop until the red lights stop flashing may result in license suspension and a fine of up to $1,000.

comment.text: If you pass a school bus that is stopped with its red lights flashing, you will: | Drivers must come to a complete stop when approaching a school bus stopped with its red lights flashing. Failure to stop until the red lights stop flashing may result in license suspension and a fine of up to $1,000.

hasPart.name: Fines in a construction zone are:

about.name: Fines in a construction zone are:

hasPart.assesses: Fines in a construction zone are: | Fines in a construction zone are: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Fines for moving traffic violations are doubled in highway construction or maintenance zones where workers are present. When operating in a construction zone, you must drive carefully and follow all directions provided by signs, signals, officers, and flaggers.

answerExplanation.text: Fines for moving traffic violations are doubled in highway construction or maintenance zones where workers are present. When operating in a construction zone, you must drive carefully and follow all directions provided by signs, signals, officers, and flaggers.

comment.text: Fines in a construction zone are: | Fines for moving traffic violations are doubled in highway construction or maintenance zones where workers are present. When operating in a construction zone, you must drive carefully and follow all directions provided by signs, signals, officers, and flaggers.

hasPart.name: If your car's suspension is bad, it can cause:

about.name: If your car's suspension is bad, it can cause:

hasPart.assesses: If your car's suspension is bad, it can cause: | If your car's suspension is bad, it can cause: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Your suspension helps you control your vehicle and provides a comfortable ride over varying road surfaces. If your vehicle bounces a lot after driving over a bump, or is generally hard to control, you may need new suspension parts.

answerExplanation.text: Your suspension helps you control your vehicle and provides a comfortable ride over varying road surfaces. If your vehicle bounces a lot after driving over a bump, or is generally hard to control, you may need new suspension parts.

comment.text: If your car's suspension is bad, it can cause: | Your suspension helps you control your vehicle and provides a comfortable ride over varying road surfaces. If your vehicle bounces a lot after driving over a bump, or is generally hard to control, you may need new suspension parts.
